flawed_nl_solution:
James is 37-15=<<37-15=22>>22 years old
So 8 years ago he was 22-8=<<22-8=14>>14 years old
That means Janet was 14/2=<<14/2=7>>7 years old 8 years ago
So Janet is now 7+8=<<7+8=51>>51 years old
That means Susan is 51-3=<<51-3=48>>48 years old
So in 5 years she will be 48+5=<<48+5=53>>53 years old
#### 53

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 15, not 51. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
